full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA BSTEN TSUL GYI GZHUNG SKOR LAS BTUS PA'I YIG CHUNG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018B CES PA 'DI NI BSHES GNYEN BSTEN PA'I CHA SKYEN 'GYUR RAM SNYAM PA'I REBS ^RGYAL KHANG RTZER 'BOD PAS BSGRIGS PA LA, BLA MA BSTEN TSUL GYI ZHUNG THOR BU RNAMS YAS BTUS BAM GTOGS KHO POS, GZHUNG CHEN MO MTHOD PA NI MA YIN NO, YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG TSE RING SKYABS SO, ,'DI LA DKAR CHA YOD NA BSHES GNYEN DAM PAS 'BRAL BA MED PAR RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,, AOm SVASTI, 'DI YANG RGYAL KHANG RTZE BA RIN PO CHE'I, ,THUGS RJE LA BRTEN TE LA KER MU RENG GI ,DGA' LDAN DAR RGYAS GLING GI CHOS GRVA RU, ,T'A CHING DZA SAG TSE LDAN RDO RJE YIS, ,PHYAG RDOR RNAM 'PHRUL NYID KYI ZHABS BRTAN DANG, ,DGE LDAN BSTAN PA DAR BA'I CHA RKYEN DU, DMIGS TE DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BA 'DIS, ,'BREL THOGS LTOS BCAS JI SNYAD MCHIS PA KUN, ,BDAG SOGS DENG NAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO'I BAR, ,'BRAL @019A *, ,MED RJES BZUNG KHYAD PAR SHA MA BHA LAR, ,RDZOGS LDAN GSAR BA'I DGA' STON SHAR BA'I TSE, ,'KHOR GYI THOG MA NYID DU SKYES PAR SHOG ,CES PA 'DI NI DPAR DU BSGRUBS TSE SPAR BYAD DGOS TSUL LTAR GYI NA BA ZHIG GIS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BLA MA BSTEN TSUL GYI MAN NGAG YIG CHUNG 'DI NI, HO THO RKO TE TVA LAS GUNG BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG SHOG GI CHOS GRVA DGA' LDAN BSTAN RGYAS GLING GI GZHUNG GSAR 'OG GI GRVA RIG MGON PO SRUNG SOGS KYIS SPAR DU BSKRUN BA'I DGE BAS TSE RABS KUN DU BLA MA DAM PAS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG ,
